Module count
Package count.model

Class ML

java.lang.Object
count.model.ML
Direct Known Subclasses:
DirectEM, EM, MLDistribution, MLFreeMixed, MLMixedRate, MLRates, MLTotalRates
public abstract class ML
extends Object
Root class for model parameter setting by likelihood maximization, defining the common interface for extending classes.
Author:
Miklós Csűrös

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    protected static class  ML.BoundedLogistic
    Logistic transformation for range[0,max].
    static interface  ML.BoundedParameter
    Model parameter with simultaneous tracking of its complement.
    protected static class  ML.Logarithmic
    Logarithmic transformation for parameter 0 ≤ θ
    protected static class  ML.Logistic
    Logistic transformation for parameter 0 ≤ θ ≤ A.
    static interface  ML.ModelParameter
    Model parameters.
